article_title: A Modest Step To Improve Medicare Post-Acute Care

article_metadata.author: Howard Gleckman

og.description: Medicare has a huge and growing problem caring for patients after they have been discharged from the hospital. After years of talk, Congress may be about to take a modest but important first step toward cleaning up the mess, and making sure that patients get care that gives them the best [...]
